name: Microwave Roast Chicken Dinner Plates with Mash, Green Beans, and Gravy
description: Heat-and-eat roast chicken with creamy mashed potatoes, microwave-steamed green beans, and warm gravy. Kid-friendly, no chili heat, ready in minutes.
prep_steps: Set out 4 microwave-safe plates and a microwave-safe bowl with a lid.
Trim ends from green beans if needed and place in the bowl with 2 tablespoons water; cover.
Open gravy and place in a small microwave-safe jug or bowl.
Have butter and salt and pepper ready for seasoning.
cook_steps: Microwave roast chicken according to package directions until hot.
Microwave mashed potatoes according to package directions until steaming.
Microwave the covered green beans on High for 3–5 minutes until crisp-tender; drain any water.
Microwave gravy on High for 60–90 seconds, stirring halfway, until hot.
Plate chicken (slice if desired), add a scoop of mashed potatoes, and a serving of green beans to each plate.
Top potatoes with butter; season potatoes and green beans with salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon gravy over chicken (and potatoes if desired) and serve.
